description: Episode number 3 of Series "The Kindergarten child series". Kindergarten children are observed here responding to the rhythm of music. The teacher, while playing a guitar, encourages different responses at different times, sometimes the rhythmic cadence of sticks and sometimes a vocal response. At the conclusion the children disperse in an orderly way for refreshment and "quiet time".
